metadata.title: CVE-2014-0977 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Rich Text Editor in MovableType 5.0x, 5.1x before 5.161, 5.2.x before 5.2.9, and 6.0.x before 6.0.1allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-0977` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.2.9+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.2.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.9+dfsg-1').
